scripts.build: npm run install-all && npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.build:web: cd apps/web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-all: cd apps/api && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run setup:api && npm run setup:web
scripts.setup:api: cd apps/api && npm install && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
